sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from "axios"; export default class UploadDocuments2 extends Component { state = { alesReq : null, sgk: null, experience: null, ALESResult:null, englishExamResult: null, referenceLetter:null, referenceLetter2:null, statementOfPurpose:null, ALESResultInput: null, experinceInput: null, success: false, }; handlechange = (event) => { const target = event.target; const name = target.name; const value = target.value; this.setState({ [name]: value, }); }; ALESReqHandle=(event)=> { const target = event.target; if(target.value === "Yes"){ this.setState({ALESResultInput :

ALES result file

}) }else{ this.setState({ALESResultInput:

I have at least 1250 days of working experience documented by the relevant government body (in Turkey, SGK)

Yes
No
}) } } experienceHandle=(event)=> { const target = event.target; if(target.value === "Yes"){ this.setState({ALESResultInput :

ALES result file

}) }else{ this.setState({ALESResultInput:

I have at least 1250 days of working experience documented by the relevant government body (in Turkey, SGK)

Yes
No
}) } } submit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const payload = { alesReq: this.state.alesReq, sgk: this.state.sgk, }; await axios({ url: "http://commerchant.herokuapp.com/accounts/register", method: "POST", data: payload, }) .then( (response) => ( this.setState({ datas: response }), alert(response.data.message) ) ) .catch(() => console.log("Register Başarısız")); }; upload = async (event) => { const target = event.target; const name = target.name; const file = target.files[0]; await axios({ url: "http://commerchant.herokuapp.com/documents/upload/", method: "POST", headers: { // Authorization: window.localStorage.getItem("token") Authorization: "Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..Y9Kt_w2oQkuVHBpcC2jbBK8SzYqXAIPRGuVzKGJtH34", }, body: { title: name, document: file, }, }) .then((response) => console.log(response.success)) .catch(() => console.log("Upload Başarısız")); }; render() { return (

Step 2 / 4

Ales Requirements

{this.state.ALESResultInput}

Are you applying with ALES requirements ?

Yes
No

Working experience document

English exam result

Reference letters

Statement of purpose

) } }
